dt.t: His colleagues might have disowned him, but they didn't receive {wi}flattering{/wi} invitations to speak all over the country and to write for {it}The New York Times{/it}.

shortdef: showing or expressing gratifying respect or admiration

dt: {bc}to praise excessively especially from motives of self-interest

dt: {bc}to encourage or gratify especially with the assurance that something is right
